lead_paragraph: The "Big 4" of men's tennis is enthusiastic about their sport's place in the Olympics, unlike their counterparts in golf.

headline.print_headline: 3 Out of 4 Ain't Bad: Djokovic, Murray, Nadal Headed to Rio
